result.execSummary:
The defendant Bradley E Ammon was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia [Modifiers: Repeater], an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Bradley E Ammon

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Bradley E Ammon in court with attorney Christopher James Simonds.  Defendant Bradley E Ammon in custody.  Christopher D. Steenrod appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Carolyn Kingsley.
St - Plea to Ct 1, rec 30 days RCJ - conc to PO hold
Rights given 
P - Guilty
BTC: Finding of guilt Ct 1. PDP/RO - 30 Days RCJ - conc to any present sentence/hold. Waive costs
Status conference on August 24, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Pre-trial conference on August 6, 2015 at 03:15 pm.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any controlled substances.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report directly to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.   The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Bradley E Ammon in court with attorney Sheila M. Smith.  Defendant Bradley E Ammon in custody.  Randall Schneider appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Pat Phinisee.  Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, p-ng, bond set.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 6, 2015 at 03:15 pm.  Status conference scheduled for August 24, 2015 at 08:30 am.
